sub_topic: Micelle formation and critical micelle concentration
message_1: What is the critical micelle concentration of sodium dodecyl sulfate in water at 25°C?
message_2: The critical micelle concentration (CMC) of sodium dodecyl sulfate (SDS) in water at 25°C is approximately 8.2 mM (millimolar). This value can vary slightly depending on the specific conditions and purity of the SDS used.
